personal.name: Anusree Pankan
personal.title: MERN Stack Developer
personal.summary: I have 1.6 years of professional experience building responsive, high-performance web applications. Skilled in React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and TypeScript, with hands-on expertise in REST APIs and cloud deployment (AWS, Vercel, Render, Netlify). I love creating scalable, user-friendly solutions that boost engagement, accessibility, and performance.
personal.aboutme: From crafting sleek interfaces with React.js to designing robust backends with Node.js & Express, I thrive on turning ideas into reliable, real-world applications. With over 1.5 years in full stack development and 30+ completed projects, I focus on building apps that people love to use.

experience.title: Web Developer
achievements: Delivered 30+ responsive web applications, driving a 40% increase in user engagement through optimized performance and modern UI design.
Engineered the corporate website for Trigeminal AI, strengthening online presence and boosting brand recognition across key markets.
Implemented SEO best practices and mobile-first design, improving search engine rankings and enhancing accessibility for 5,000+ monthly visitors.
Developed interactive platforms (e.g., restaurant ordering system, image gallery for DigiDxDoc) with intuitive UX, resulting in higher customer retention rates.
Collaborated with designers and cross-functional teams to deploy scalable, production-ready solutions that reduced development time by 20%.

experience.title: MERN Stack Intern
achievements: Completed a NACTET-certified MERN Stack program, gaining hands-on experience in full-stack development with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Built and deployed multiple capstone projects, applying modern frameworks (React, Angular) and version control with Git/GitHub to simulate real-world workflows.
Gained practical skills in React, Angular, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Git.

projects.name: Ecommerce Web Application
projects.description: Developed a furniture e-commerce platform with payments, wallet integration, Google Sign-In, and coupons. Deployed on AWS with media handling via Cloudinary.

projects.name: Todo listing Application
projects.description: Full-stack Todo app with React, Node.js/Express, and MongoDB. Manage tasks with a responsive UI.

projects.name: Pet Clinic Website
projects.description: Built an appointment booking system with responsive UI and cross-device compatibility.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Applied Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering
education.thesis: IoT-based Vehicle Accident Detection System with real-time location alerts via Bluetooth.
